mapper.select: select d.id as deptId, d.name as deptName, d.avatar as avatar from system_user_dept a inner join system_dept d on a.dept_id = d.id where a.deleted = false and d.deleted = false and a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.id

select a.id as userDeptId, u.username as username, u.id as userId, a.dept_role as deptRole, u.mobile as mobile, u.email as email, a.cost_points as costPoints, a.image_count as imageCount from system_user_dept a inner join system_users u on a.user_id = u.id where a.deleted = false and u.deleted = false and a.dept_id = #{deptId} order by u.id
